content.detailedDescription: I was outside having a cup of coffee enjoying the morning sun before going to work. i was doing some stretching and yoga and laid back and looked up at the clear blue sky. a star like object caught my eye. at first i thought it was a jet at very high altitude with the sun's light was reflecting off of it. however, it was not moving. it was stationary at very high altitude. not flickering, not flashing. no changing color. just a star like object stationary for at least 30 min. during this time i called tallahasse airport and asked to speak to the tower. after being shuffled around and having to tell my story several times, i spoke to the tower and they did not have anything on radar. i also took approximately 10 photos with my smartphone. i could not tell if i had got the object in the photos but i did notice while taking them that a contrail was present in my camera screen, but not visible to my naked eye. i then went in to work, and looked at the photos and saw the pictures did capture the contrail, and a couple did have the star object but only visble on greater magnification, although somewhat fuzzy. most interesting are the round shadow like objects captured in the photos but not visible to my naked eye. i also captured a jet in one photo and it does give one a bit of a perspective. could it have been venus, jupiter, or saturn visible at 8:30 am on a bright sunny morning? i dont know. i think it was really a object at very high altitute maybe 50-100,000 ft. there were a couple of jets that went by during the event and this object was higher. the contrail and round grey shadow objects appear to be at different altitudes. i dont think they are ghost images or reflections off of something. i took several photos with them in the photos and they are in the same location (using the playfort fabric roof as a reference point). i am sure i moved around and took each photo from a slightly different location, yet the objects appear in the same location in the sky. maybe you guys have someone that can analyze the photos.
content.summary: Starlike object at +50k ft directly overhead. no movement. 8am clear blue sky.  looked like star in daytime.

content.detailedDescription:
On saturday june 3, 2017, while participating in cseti's worldwide ce-5 initiative on my own and without a group or a team, i was practicing the ce-5 protocols for about 2 and a half hours and alternating between meditation, remote viewing, and playing certain tones recorded during a crop circle investigation. after roughly two hours and forty five minutes i packed up my things and began walking towards the forest parking lot. i decided i should walk backwards just in case i might happen to miss something in the sky behind me as i left, and just before reaching the parking lot and while viewing the south eastern part of the sky (the sky was very cloudy, i could barely see the moon above and the clouds blocked out the stars, and we also have a lot of light pollution in our area) i witnessed what looked very much like a shooting star and it was visible for only about one second. what is compelling is just how cloudy and light polluted the sky was, and since i could not see any stars i found it very bizarre that i should see a "shooting star" that was not only visible below the cloud line but also which traveled on a flat, horizontal trajectory. at an altitude below the cloud line, i believe that it would defy the laws of physics for a meteorite or space debris to be at such a low altitude and somehow traveling horizontally with no downward arc heading towards the earth.
i find the timing of the event highly suspicious as well, i set out that night with the intent of peacefully vectoring in any et vehicles willing to appear for us and and demonstrate their beauty and peacefulness (i had some rather interesting visuals while meditating and remote viewing) and the chances of just happening to see an extremely rare shooting star that was somehow visible among the clouds and traveling on a seemingly impossible trajectory for an unintelligent object to be extremely slim. i've seen plenty of shooting stars in my life, but not a single one which i can recall in naperville, even on the clearest of nights. really the only resemblance it had to a shooting star was the speed at which it was moving, in fact it may have been moving faster than most shooting stars. it was also unlike a shooting star in that it did not appear to diminish and disintegrate, it popped out of view with the exact same brightness as it did when it appeared, and again it appeared amid a completely cloudy part of the sky. 
i truly wish i had been able to record it on video, or at the very least to have had a secondary witness. keep in mind, i take this subject extremely seriously and i do my best to debunk any "potential sightings" i may witness because if i'm going to see one, i want to be certain that i saw what i think i saw. i would not be posting this sighting were i not so sure that it was something otherworldly, i've waited several days in the time since i witnessed it, i have slept on it and have determined after much consideration, research, and healthy skepticism that it was not some extremely coincidental freak of nature shooting star somehow defying the law of physics. 
to anyone who reads this, believe in the truth. they are out there, they are visiting, and based on their lack of agression they are more than likely peaceful or at least neutral observers of our civilization. if you are like myself and would absolutely love to have a sighting, check out cseti/sirius disclosure and their ce-5 protocols. you do not have to spend any money in order to learn how to initiate contact, it just takes time and practice with regard to meditation, and a very open mind. anyone can have these experiences, and for anyone reading, thank you for taking me seriously and keep an open mind, and keep your eyes to the skies...
content.summary: While practicing ce-5 protocols taught by cseti, i witnessed what looked like a shooting star but was visible amidst the clouds and had no downward gravitational arc, and had no tail.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Filled out at mufon headquarters with witness on the phone, by field investigator l. flechtner 18809 on june 6, 2017
----------------------------------------------------------------

it was memorial day, barely sunset, when i went out to my back porch, which faces west, and again saw the bright light moving slowing in the sky. this time when the light dimmed out, i saw the shape of a craft where the light had been. the shape of the craft was a rectangle with a smaller rectangle on top of it. the color was brownish red, rust colored. i watched it slowly move across the sky and go behind a small cloud. it never came out of the cloud. i waited for 50 minutes. i guess it was the size of a small plane.

i had gone outside to see the storm clouds in the distance when i noticed the light.

i have seen this light in the sky before, and have watched it move across the sky and then dim out. because i see the light at night, when it dims out, i never saw anything where it had been before. this time it was light enough outside to read a book.

in september/october four years ago, i saw the bright light, bright like venus, slowly go over my house and then dim out. the next night i saw two lights go over my house and dim out. in the same week i again saw the light go over my house and then dim out. 
i live 5 miles from an airport and recognize regular aircraft when they fly over, and i can hear them and see their lights, these lights that dim are not regular aircraft. 

another time, when my son was just learning to drive we saw the light.
we were waiting to turn left onto a main road, ware street, when i noticed the light. it was dark and we were just going to the gas station. when we turned left, the light seemed to follow us and continued to follow us until we got to the gas station, then the light faded out.
content.summary: It was barely sunset when i went out to my back porch and again saw the bright light in the sky, this time when it dimmed out i saw the shape of a craft where the light had been.

content.detailedDescription: On february 20, 2017 at about 9:30pm i was camping at the vogel canyon recreation area, about 10 miles south of la junta, co.  it was very cloudy that night, and few stars were visible.  i was watching a plane (?) come from the west as it went in and out of cloud cover.  right near it, i saw 3 brilliant golden flashes in succession.  it was very strange since it was a heavy cloud cover and i could see very few stars/planets shining through.  the flashes were very, very bright....Brighter than anything else in the sky.  i watched that area of the sky for over half an hour afterwards and saw nothing.  i don't think i have ever seen such a bright light in the sky....Ever.  except the sun.
content.summary: Saw a brilliant golden/yellow flash 3 times.

content.detailedDescription:
When looking at the object with the naked eye it just appeared to be very brightly lit and to have wings.  however this changed when viewing with binoculars, and again when viewed through the night vision app on the phone.   also when viewing with the naked eye, no change in shape or motion could be noticed.

when viewing through binoculars it was radically different.  now i could see that there was first a sort of cylinder shape, with equal parts colored red, white and blue, which glowed very brightly.  then it looked like it was beaming a spotlight, and at first i thought it was beaming a light to search the ground but as i watched it seemed to cause a thing to materialize at the end of the beam (which widened), which thing looked like a sparkly cloud that kind of shimmered or had shimmering bits in it.  at all times when it was doing this it maintained the same distance between it and the object at the end of the beam.  while it did this, it was just sort of floating around in the sky, and then occasionally the first section, the red-white-blue cyclinder, would change into sort of a half-circle of lights that looked like candle-flames next to one another, like five or six candle-flames in a semi-circle.  then other times it became a glowing ring.  it would alternate between these the whole time.  oftentimes when it moved it reminded me of the way a butterfly moves. 

it did this while i watched for about two hours, and then the sun came up.  as it grew lighter outside, the craft seemed to just begin floating upward, and rose higher and higher til i eventually couldn’t see it.

when i viewed it through the night vision app, it appeared just as a very bright glowing object that left trails, but no detail could be seen.  the only time you could see detail or even see it doing anything at all was with the binoculars.  with the naked eye, it just looked like a brightly lit aircraft and didn’t appear to be doing anything and you could not see it moving or making any beam or ring or anything, but as soon as i looked through the binoculars i could see these things.
content.summary: Bright object appearing to have wings but which changed when viewed with binoculars

content.detailedDescription:
(1)i was walking northbound from my parked truck to enter the building i work in.

(2)i have always kept my eyes on the sky, even as a child. i have seen many unidentifiable craft in my days and my grandfather worked for boeing and rockwell. this helped create my interest in the sky watching at a very young age. 

(3) at first glance i thought that the object was a hovering helicopter, a bunch of balloons, or possibly a drone of some sort. the lack of noise or lights made me discredit the possibility of this object being a helicopter or drone. i work in the aerospace industry now and my company is 5 to 10 miles from lax. there are multiple flight paths that i observe daily to my admiration of aircraft. there are also a large number of military flights that take place in this airspace, but the military craft are usually helicopters and not jets. they are always very loud and noticeable. v22 ospreys fly over the 110 south and then hook a right westbound over rancho palo verdes quite often as well.

(4) when i first observed the object i was facing west from my location and i was under the impression that it was hovering in place. in retrospect, it may have been advancing towards my position because this was the only point in my observation that i was under the impression it may have been hovering. once i noticed it was moving i also noticed it was doing so at a steady pace. it was traveling north east slightly (more north direction than east) and i observed it slowly adjust it's path and change direction from north east to north west. it appeared to be attempting to morph. despite the surface of this craft moving around in a very unstable and liquid type motion it's velocity and trajectory were stable. it was almost like a cloud of heavy metallic black liquid but it's overall shape remained relatively uniform. the nature of this object made it very hard to focus my vision on despite the fact that the craft was dark black and the grey clouds and sunrise made the sky very contrasted against the color of the craft. i felt as though it was tricking my eyes into looking at the clouds above it instead of the craft itself. shortly after it changed direction (north east) it began to shift it's shape more noticeably and it went from a big morphing liquid blob to an elongated and very small boomerang type black craft that was no longer morphing. it seemed to become completely solid at that point. once again with no lights or sounds. almost immediately after it shape shifted, it began to shrink in size at a extremely impressive rate. 

(5)i have witnessed many different types of unidentified objects and this was by far the most troubling and emotional sighting. i felt shocked and scared and for once i felt terrified instead of intrigued or awestruck. i have seen lights, orbs, but never anything like this. 

(6) it shrank in size until it was gone. either it literally shrank, or it traveled away from me at a great speed.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
content.summary: What appeared at first to be a bunch of black ballons morphed into a boomerang like craft and then it dissapeared by taking off at a great speed which caused it to decrease in size at a very fast rate until it was gone.

content.detailedDescription: I've been in this object numerous times since i was 17. it only happens to me when i'm sleeping alone in my room. i sleep on the couch to avoid this. what they've done to me, i'm not proud of. how anything, human or not could do the things they did to me is beyond my comprehension. since my grandson is tpying this for me, i'm not going to blurt it out. use your imagination.It was never up the stairs, it was always on the bottom floor on a table. i'll be glad when they start leaving me alone, i'm almost 65.
content.summary: Like a pumpkin with with a big door. stairs leading to the door. it looked like it was made of glass. i went inside to another stairway. there were doors all around, like garage doors. they opened from the bottom. this is not the first time i have been he

content.detailedDescription: Approx 3 hours into the flight from balt to la i noticed 3 very bright lights hovering and i cap it with iphone camera , i was overwheled with and very excited to see such an amazing event
content.summary: Bright lights visable from 30,000 feet up - midflight

content.detailedDescription:
Friend and i were walking our dogs at approx 6pm,we live in/ on the west end of a small town called crewe cheshire (uk) walking on our local field the george playing field, my  friend was taking pictures of the sky and cloud, due to there being lots of interesting  types of clouds, when he spotted what appeared to be a contrail from a crazy pilot. however when we zoomed in on a picture he took i realised that it could not, in any way be a contrail. there were many planes in the sky, and their contrails were totally different to this, and dissipated with the wind at a fast rate. not only this, but where ever there was a contrail a plane was clearly visible at the front of it. this ribbon shaped worm thing stayed in the sky un-changed for over ten minutes before it dissapeard completely!  i have sent the original un touched pictures to you. all i have done is zoomed in and cropped. when i returned home, i typed "sky snake" into google, and imidietly found identical annomalise, however no explanation as to what it may be. i have asked pilots that i know through model plane groups on facebook, they have said they have never seen anything of the sort before and agree that it isnt a contrail. each end of the (snake) has the same shape. there was no craft , helicopter, drone, plane or any other type of terrestrial craft near this thing. also there are areas of the thing which appear to be flattend compared to others, almost like a twisted ribbon, reminds me of a tape worm. the size of this thing must have been several miles long, as you can see by the pictures. this is not an image artefact, this thing really was in the sky.
any help identifying this would be greatly appreciated
content.summary: Very long ribbon shaped snake type object

content.detailedDescription: I like to take photos of the sun and i've had lens flares before but this one had me scratching my head. i snapped these and didn't notice anything strange till i looked at the pics indoors when i went to use one for a profile pic on facebook. i found them interesting and thought i'd get your opinion on rather these are lens flares or not before i jump to conclusions. they were taken on my galaxy s6.Thank you for your time.
content.summary: I like snapping photos of the sun and i've had lens flare before but not like this

content.detailedDescription: I reversed out of the carport as i was taking my children to school - just like every other weekday. i looked behind me as i was reversing then for some reason i looked up. i saw a chemtrail. i stopped my car (still in the driveway), i got out my phone and took 2 photo's. i took 2 because with the first photo i had the flash on. i put my phone away and took the kids to school as normal. after dropping them off went to the shops and upon my return home i saw a second chemtrail so i took a photo of that one too. once inside i had a look at the photos i took as it's not often you see a full moon, chemtrail and sun in one photo. when i was looking at the second photo i saw the green circle at the top of the photo. at first i thought it was a reflection from my camera and perhaps the angle of my phone when i took the second photo. i then zoomed in the photo to see that this green disc/orb is nothing like i have ever seen before. it also has a wider ring with what appears to be smaller rings within.I cannot explain this shape being in the sky at all. i then took a much closer look at first photo (flash on) as there is no physical green disc/orb. but in the approx same area i pretty sure i can see a white sort of circle with smaller circles within. but i am not sure so i am hoping mufon can help with this. i am unsure as to how long the object stayed there because i returned to driving my children to school.
content.summary: Leaving to take kids to school when we saw a chemtrail. i took 2 photos. saw the orb when looking at the photos

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the park, with my wife and nephew, and saw a small red coloured object
in the sky above at a height of more than 500 ft flying slowly in an easterly direction. 
my nephew (7 year old) saw it too. i took a photo with my samsung s8 phone, but it
was not really clearly visible in the screen, i took a 2nd photo in the direction where
i thought the object was, only to discover that there were 6 objects in the picture.
i did not see them physically though, as they only showed up in the photograph.

it was a partially cloudy day. some parts of the sky were blue, and other parts in dark grey cloud. typical london sky, but we had a massive thunderstorm a few hours prior to that.

the pictures were only taken within 30 seconds of each other.
content.summary: Took 2 pics - only observed 1 object - but 2nd photo revealed 6 objects

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Hb uso 6/5/17
i recoded this video at 9:20pm in huntington beach, dog beach, ca. location was 133° sw 33.6748 latitude -118.0272 longitude. 
my friend and i had gone to the beach for blue hour, but the weather conditions created low visibility and the marine layer was thick. we stayed a while after, at the shore talking about aliens, oddly enough, and we were thrown off and perplexed at the sight of bright neon blue lights out on the water, a distance at about where the oil rigs are located. just south of the last oil rig at the dog beach in h.B. these 6+ lights were horizontal, in a saucer shaped silhouette, just at the surface, what looked like a vehicle maneuvering faster and at more ease than a boat should. it was dismissed as coast guards. when the lights went just below the surface of the water, they changed to green. not a turquoise, but a neon green. searching for answers to what this might be, we agreed upon bioluminescent jellyfish. perhaps a school floating at the surface.
but then these lights turned red! the were now changing from blue to red.
it had been quite difficult to make out these lights from our vantage and the weather was poor, making visibility challenging. the surf was strong and high tide was coming in.
these lights were in our visibility from the shore for at least 45 minutes.  about 30 minutes into the sighting a helicopter flew very low, and in the same course as the lights had been on, slowly drifting south. at one point there were two sets of red lights, from the helicopter above and at the surface of the water below.
i shot this video in hopes that your instruments and technology can filter out noise of this very poor quality video.
thank you, and i look forward to hearing back from your agency.

best,
-kimi k.
content.summary: Saw from the shore, blinking blue, red and green lights out on the surface of the ocean

content.detailedDescription:
I was out for a late morning walk when i first saw it. it was an orb that was redish-orange and slowly rotated without making any sound what so ever. it stayed perfectly in place as i observed it. the day was sunny without any clouds in the sky. i couldn't take my eyes off it. the strangest part was that it seemed to emit small licks of flame as it rotated. but it could have been just the sunlight reflecting off of it. there were no hard edges to the craft. i was standing almost in the center of leonard place (street name) in trumbull, ct. i became so engrossed that i didn't even hear the small truck approaching me on the road until it started beeping it's horn at me. i took my eyes off the object and moved to the side of the road to let the light truck pass. once it did, i quickly looked up again but the object was gone. i looked all around  but saw nothing. it was as if it had just completely disappeared into thin air. it shook me up quite a bit. when i got home i told my wife but she dismissed it as some kind of new flying object that the airforce was testing. but to me, it didn't look like anything i had ever seen before and looked totally, not of this earth. 
i never told anyone else about this as i was afraid that they might laugh at me, or worse.
i finally decided to let you know as i've been noticing similar incidents on youtube, but they all seem to have  occured at night.
content.summary: An orb that was red-orange, slowly rotating with absolutely no sound. staying perfectly in place.

content.detailedDescription: It wasn't visible to the eye. i captured it by accident while photographing what i thought was a weird chrmtrail cloud.I i decided to turn on the video to see it i could capture it on the video as a joke for my friend. i don't know what it was but it was something. i looked back at another rainbow cloud i saw a few days earlier and saw another dot on that still too. it was moving weird and fast in the video which was odd.  one of the still photos captured it very close to the sun and it created a weird purple glow. none of this was visible to the eye,it was only visable in the photo which i was checking to see if i captured the rainbow.
content.summary: I was photographing a weird rainbow on a cloud. i noticed what looked like the moon in the pictures then i noticed it was in different locations. as a joke i said let's do a video, it might be a ufo. we couldn't see it with our eyes but we did catch somet

content.detailedDescription: While outside me and a friend was testing out my new telescope trying to focus in on saturn.  we was out there for around an hour or so trying to figure it out.  i was almost dialed in on saturn with the site scope when my friend quietly but urgently told me to look and nudged me. when i looked at what he was pointing at in the sky at first thinking a shooting star.  but this was no shooting star.  we saw a triangle shaped ship flying very fast and low.  it was really like a glide with no noise no lights. it was only about 5 seconds but long enough for us both to tell it was something neither one of us was not supposed to see.  it was almost like in a camoflauge/silhouette in the night sky.  i'd say it was about 400ft wide and 300ft long. i can't say it is or is not related but i have had some weird physical and physiological events following this encounter.
content.summary: Large triangle shape flying extremely fast no lights very low no sound or trail

content.detailedDescription: SvĚdek pozorování uvádí: bylo 9. 4.(neděle) 2017, cca 20,15 hod., když jsem vyšel v panelákovém bytě ve třetím poschodí na balkón. měsíc krásně svítil a byl i dost veliký. bylo sice trochu zataženo ale pár hvězd bylo vidět. když jsem se podíval po obloze, tak mě zaujalo těleso, které se vznášelo nad panelovým sídlištěm u roháčovy ulice v praze 3. zaujalo mě blikáním mnoha červených světel. nejprve jsem si myslel, že se jedná o vrtulník, ale tomu tolik světel nebliká. Červená světla byla velmi jasná, bylo jich více než 10 a neustále blikaly. poslouchal jsem, jestli neuslyším od tělesa nějaký hluk, ale nic jsem neslyšel. z tohoto důvodu vylučuji, že by šlo o vrtulník. těleso se pohybovalo velmi pomalu. spíše to vypadalo jako by každou chvíli stálo. těleso velmi pomalu letělo (spíše se vznášelo větrem) směrem na vítkov. vzal jsem fotoaparát, pořídil pár fotek a 2 videa. jelikož nemám fotoaparát na noční snímání, tak video je při přiblížení rozmazané. fotoaparát canon má zoom 34x na který jsem filmoval.  neznámé těleso se asi po více než 10 minutách začalo vracet zpět a neustále celou dobu blikaly červená světla. vzal jsem si dalekohled 20x60 a prohlédl si těleso ještě více zblízka. zjistil jsem, že těch blikajících světel je kolem 20 a blikají na nějaké malé pyramidě, trojúhelníku nebo čtverci. uprostřed ještě blikají zelená a modrá světla, která se střídají. ty jsem očima neviděl, až teprve v dalekohledu. zároveň jsem se všiml v dalekohledu 2 ramen, které byly asi 3x delší než ten pevný, našedlý prostředek tělesa. myslím si, že těleso bylo vzdálené několik stovek metrů. myslím tak max. do 500m. velikost objektu si vlivem slabší viditelnosti (večer) netroufnu odhadnout. těleso se po celou dobu pohybovalo velmi pomalu, beztišně a bylo na něm vidět, že když letělo zpátky, tak začalo stoupat. nakonec se mně ztratilo za dalším panelovým domem, kdy už přestalo být z mého místa vidět. mohla to být nějaká nová hračka dron, ale jelikož jsem ho sledoval skoro 20 minut, tak by měl docela velkou výdrž ve vzduchu. to už nejsou drony za pár desítek tisíc. ani mě nenapadá, proč měl tolik červeně blikajících světel. oproti vrtulníku 10x více. z tohoto důvodu byl i velmi zřetelně vidět. na obloze bylo těleso nepřehlédnutelné. prakticky celá pevná část tělesa byla obložena světly. jenom ramena světla neměly. zvláštní.
content.summary: Objekt ve tvaru diamantu, viděný z balkónu vznášel se nad panelovým sídlištěm u roháčovy ulice v praze 3. zaujal mě blikáním mnoha červených a modro-bílých světel.

content.detailedDescription:
This is about a prior report.  i think in 2008, in the us.  a girl driving and we bumped into her car.  the car appeared melted; it was.
all the discoveries that "earthlings" make about fossils, skulls, bumping into cars.  it is a lesson to tell you, we did that in the past.  we blew ourselves up.  i'm warning you.  now, this has to do with "reality" and "unreality", light, time/space, gravity; all of it, but particularly light. 

i am a watcher.  

we are all watchers, but it is about illumination and spark (big bangs)and how all the math works. 

i'm trying to mathematically encode the functionality of the relationship of the watchers and your society. to let you know how everything works and to tell you, as a society, to stop destroying yourselves.

because in one part, of what most people call reality; what "we" see.  that has to do with "mass", you are us at a past time.
content.summary: Something was bumping into my car, pushed in into the next lane.

content.detailedDescription: Disc shaped cloud appeared to keep shape. you will notice in last pic that it is in front of a tree top that has to be 20 feet off the ground. the clouds were higher then that. it is an interesting anomaly. i saw a lightening bolt while sitting near the mall. it went around in a spherical fashion like it was around a saucer shape in the cloud. i found that odd the formation of the lightening bolt. just an observation

content.detailedDescription: It appeared out of no where i have multuple pictures time stamped within mili seconds before and after yet it only shows up in the ttop right hand of 1 picture then is gone. totally wild never have experienced before. iknow its not a drone i have several friends that fly them..
content.summary: Wow not sure what else to say

content.detailedDescription: As i was outside relaxing during work i noticed in the north sky an star-like object moving different directions above the treeline. i watched it for 20 minutes before i went back inside. i came out an hour later and it was nowhere to be seen.
content.summary: Shiney star-like object moving in a square pattern then a retrangle.

content.detailedDescription:
Well i never in my wildest dreams thought i would ever report something like this but here it is..
on the night of friday, june 3, 2017 i was getting ready for bed. we live on an acreage with no close neibours. i went to our bedroom with the lights out to close the curtains and noticed a bright white light with 4 spheres of light radiating out from the centre at 45 deg. angle. all four lights were exactly the same length and thickness. our bedroom window point south. the object was moving at a fairly slow speed from sw to se. it was a very clear night with the moon very bright just above the object in the sky. 
at first i thought it was a very bright satellite. i call my wife who was in the kitchen to come and see this. we both stood there watching this and could not determine what it was. i said i needed to go outside to see if i could hear anything. we both ran to our south facing deck and the object slowed. it then changed direction and went straight south for about 5-8 seconds and then just disappeared. there was no sound whatsoever. 

all we can say is that was weird and we have no explanation as to what it was. i know what it wasn't, it wasn't a helicopter, or a plane. we get little to no air traffic over our house and given the fact that there was no sound emitted from the object. just can't get it out of my head.. i am 58 year old professional and i have no explanation of what we seen that night.
i thought of getting the camera but i did not want to miss any of it and before i knew it it was over.

just thought i would share the experience.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright starlike light withy 4 beams of white light projected out at 45deg. traveling sw to se, stop then go s. then quickly disappear.

 date 10/06/96...34 degrees 41' 08.00"n...106 degrees 02'21.67" w...It looks like something hit and left a skid mark behind it..Its shinning very bright.....What do you think???   zoom in on it...Looks round and very bright...Thanks
content.summary: Found on goggle earth....Check below

content.detailedDescription: We have been seeing lights in the sky now for months then in past month it has turned into the lights and now orange balls of lights following us when were in vehicles or even feet away when on foot,it doesn't happen every night but i can look over and tell my brother i feel it and guaranteed sometime that night something will happen.The feeling is of something right behind you,strikes pure fear in you.Yesterday morning jun 4 at 5:15 we went to investigate the lights in the woods we've been seeing we got to the woodline and the lights started moving towards us once one of them got approximately 15 to 20 feet away i could see standing approximately 7 feet tall a grey smooth skinned alien looking and walking towards us,the lights we'd been seeing were its eyes it also seemed to illuminate a dim light around it.This terrified us so we backed off i have many videos and audio of unexplained lights and events.These are the two from that morning "clips due to size limit"both happened within minutes of each other though
content.summary: Seen ufos for months now,first alien sighting it was walking through woods lights for eyes

content.detailedDescription:
Craft first spotted when i collected my children from school at 4pm.
i then boarded a bus and departed that at 16:45.
upon walking for five minutes i noticed the craft was to my right and seemed to have just appeared but to have followed me to the new location.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Disk like with a dome on top

content.detailedDescription:
When i was heading back home on my motorcycle after i visited my girlfriend (at the time) i saw on my right upper side a clear hovering round object with around 10 lights glowing at the outside of the circle-shaped object. i noticed the object because it was definetely not an airplane or any known flying object. alien life never really bothered me,  until i saw what i saw. it was something like a round flying disk. i tried taking a clear shot with my phone camera, but back then my iphone 4s its camera was not good enough to take any clear pictures of it while i was driving (i didn't want to stop my bike because the object would be too far away by the moment i could take a picture. i saw it hovering for a period of 2 minutes so it was definetely not a glimp. it was moving at a speed of around 200km/h , definetely not very fast! i felt very weird. i didn't tell anyone but my girlfriend because (as a teenager) i was afraid friends would make fun of me. my girlfriend believed me however because she was surprised of how certain i was from what i saw.
i tried to follow the object as it was hovering parallel to the road i was driving on. it disappeared in the grey clouds. i remembered being astonished by the fact that i saw a ufo in belgium, which isn't an important country at all and it would make way more sense if it was in the usa, russia or any other big important country.
i am only reporting this now because the image i have of it still spooks my mind (almost 2 years ago). i searched some of it online and craig r. lang, close encounter researcher and mufon field investigator posted a post on quora on which he recommended this website. 

note: i didn't really believe in alien life until that event, and i am very certain of what i saw. i only want to share my story and confirm the suspicions of alien life, in hope to encourage your work.

kind regards,
albert
content.summary: Hovering ufo observed under clouds, then disappeared in clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
It happend in the winter 1983/84 near the town skien in norway.
we where playing in the woods, and a craft that looked like a wheel from and old horse carriage whit lights on flew silently over us. it coulden be more then 3-500f over us. no sound nothing at all, just traveled slowly over us,
i kept quiet about it until now since people is now accepting that strange tings can happend. the year is ok, but had to set a fiction date to send to you.
content.summary: It was flying slow over me

content.detailedDescription: I woke to a bright light at 2am. super moon bright. i thought it was the moon or a light from a property behind my home but it wasn't the moon and there are no lights behind my house. just large trees. i could see it through the trees and then it was more clear. i got nervous. woke my husband and the light dimmed. my husband saw the dimmed light but assured me i was ok. i laid back down and the light was so bright i could see all of my trees (as bright as a baseball feild light) i jumped up and grabbed my son from his room and laid him next to me. closed the door and the light dimmed. i stared at it for a few minutes then it was gone and complete darkness outside. couldn't see a thing. my dog started to growl uncontrollably and my husband took her to walk the house until the dog was more comfortable. we all laid back down and fell asleep. wish i took video this went in for 20 minutes or longer.
content.summary: Woke up to super bright light out my window.
